mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.category_id, b.member_id, m.member_alias, b.board_title, b.board_body, b.board_updated, b.board_status, b.board_score, b.board_view, b.state_del FROM mobile.board b LEFT JOIN mobile.member m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE b.state_del = 'N' AND m.state_del = m.state_del = 'N' AND b.board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mobile.board (board_title, board_body, board_created, board_updated, board_status, board_score, board_view, member_id, category_id, state_del) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardBody}, #{boardCreated}, #{boardUpdated}, #{boardStatus}, #{boardScore}, #{boardView}, #{memberId}, #{catgoryId}, #{stateDel})
mapper.update: UPDATE mobile.board SET board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_body = #{boardBody}, board_updated = #{boardUpdated}, board_status = #{boardStatus}, category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND member_id = #{memberId} AND state_del = 'N'
UPDATE mobile.board SET board_updated = #{boardUpdated}, state_del = #{stateDel} WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND member_id = #{memberId}
